comment: Anybody who rates Truong poorly shouldn't be in college. He wants all of his students to succeed, so he is not as harsh of a grader as the other nitpicky lab teachers. He's all about learning, not punishment for making a minor error. Helps students when they need it. Take no one but Truong if you want to learn and enjoy chemistry.
Best lab professor I ever had, he is really funny and is not a tough grader.

Absolutely incredible lab professor. So many others grade the notebook and lab reports so closely and one mistake could cost you big time. But Milton is super laid back and forgiving in his grading. Easy to talk to when you have questions and explained concepts before each lab better than my lecture professor did. Taking him again for chem1212L
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Would take again

comment: My absolute favorite teacher this semester. He taught me better than my chem lecture professor. I made sure to take him for my CHEM 1212 lab next semester. He helps you if you ask, he does grade lab reports kinda tough but he drops the two lowest. I'm finishing his class with an A. LOVE this professor. TAKE HIM!

My favorite professor Ive had so far. I dont know why the reviews are so bad. Very cool guy, and he will help on anything you ask. He told the class at the beginning of the semester that he would let us stay after the lab and help us with the report but hardly anyone ever did. I never made lower than an A on the lab reports.
Tough grader on labs, final exam is impossible, nice guy but strict lab grading. Why is it that KSU insists on giving such a difficult lab final so that everyone will fail?
I had 1211L with him. It was pretty smooth and easy. he's pretty knowledgeable about the subject, I'm taking ochem now and i still go to him for questions and recommendations.

He is such a good lab teacher, ignore the other comments! I got an A on all of the labs and he is so chill! As long as you show up and act like you care he will even curve your grade if you need it. Would take his class again.
He's quiet and nice but a very picky grader on labs. Missing one unit the entire problem is wrong. I'm an a student and struggled to get a c.
Hard grader on labs. doesn't explain when you have questions. Awful.
Hard lab teacher. Do NOT take,

Dr. Truong is awesome and very laid back. The only thing I would change about him is that he's kinda strict about sig figs in your lab report. That aside, he's an outstanding professor and more than willing to help.

Nice, but hard lab professor.  You have a pre-lab quiz, lab project, and lab for grade each week.  It is very hard to get an A on a lab.  You must have neat handwriting or take another professor.  I was pulling my hair out.
You have to rewrite each lab that takes hours and he is a very tough grader on lab reports.  Hard class.  Take an easier lab professor.  Too nit picky on labs.  Mmost people get c's.

Definitely take Truong for lab. All gen chem lab classes are the same content - 10/11 lab reports, 1 exam (final), SDS project, and notebook, so this course won't vary depending on professor. So choose him!!! He is young, relatable, and always willing to help teach you anything you ask for help on.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: Truong is really cool and laid back. He isn't nit-picky about little mistakes in your report and it's super easy to make a 100 on lab notebook + SDS book. He bumped my 89 to an A. He drops one lab and gives an in-depth study guide to the final (that's made by the department). Very understanding, caring, and approachable. TAKE HIM FOR LAB.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring
